text: A 60-year-old woman presented with pain in abdomen and loss of appetite for 1 month, and imaging showed locally advanced gallbladder carcinoma with liver metastasis. After biopsy confirmation, patient was initially started on gemcitabine and oxaliplatin combination followed by gene sequencing, which showed Tp53 (exon 7-c.713 G > A and exon 5-c.376-2A > G) and EGFR (exon 20-T790M) mutation, and erlotinib was added to chemotherapy, after 6 cycles of chemotherapy patient showed a 90% partial radiological response as per RECIST criteria.
